titleStmt.title: A table of boorde and timber measure, more perfect then euer hath beene made shewing also the roote betweene 4 and 31 from quarter to quarter / calculated by R.N.
titleStmt.author: Norton, Robert, d. 1635.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Robert Norton by STC (2nd ed.)

Reproduction of original in the Society of Antiquaries.
